ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Specify the timeframe (in the past year, past two weeks, etc.) in which elements/items are assessed
I can drink more than the average drinker before feeling the effects of alcohol.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neither agree nor disagree; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: I can drink more than others without experiencing a hangover.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neither agree nor disagree; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: I do not get drunk as quickly as average drinkers.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neither agree nor disagree; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: I can drink most of my friends ''under the table'' / I could outdrink most of my friends.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neither agree nor disagree; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: I usually win drinking contests or games.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neither agree nor disagree; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: Others are impressed with how much alcohol I can drink.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neither agree nor disagree; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -9= Missing

ElementDescription: Others think I can hold my alcohol well.
Notes: 1= Strongly disagree; 2= Moderately disagree; 3= Slightly disagree; 4= Neither agree nor disagree; 5= Slightly agree; 6= Moderately agree; 7= Strongly agree; -9= Missing
